name: Hyperion
startIntroPart1: Let's talk about science my friend
startIntroPart2: How are you ? wanna talk about science?
declaringWar: My soldiers will walk on the ashes of your empire
attacked: OH,OH, I am not even supprised
defeated: All over the universe, there are countless civilizations who will take you down just wait to see
introduction: You are not worthy of our attention.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
